name: CIWarpKernel
desc: A GPU-based image processing routine that processes only the geometry information in an image, used to create custom Core Image filters.

items.name: func apply(extent: CGRect, roiCallback: CIKernelROICallback, image: CIImage, arguments: [Any]) -> CIImage?
items.desc: Creates a new image using the kernel and the specified input image and arguments.
